enDesc: Yalkut Talmud Torah is a 14th-century collection of midrashim, compiled by Rabbi Jacob Sikili. Sikili traveled to many countries collecting hundreds of manuscripts, culling from the materials he found and ultimately completing the project in 1337 in Damascus.The project remained in manuscript for centuries, and select parts were published later on. The present volume covers the Book of Genesis.
enShortDesc: 14th-century collection of midrashim on the Book of Genesis.
